str2: No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.
From peirazo; a putting to proof (of good), experience (of evil), solicitation, discipline or provocation); by implication, adversity.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I receive, get, (b) I take, lay hold of.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.
Belonging to human beings (especially as contrasted with God), human (as contrasted with divine). From anthropos; human.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
Trustworthy, faithful, believing. From peitho; objectively, trustworthy; subjectively, trustful.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Who, which, what, that.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To allow, permit, let alone, leave. Of uncertain affinity; to let be, i.e. Permit or leave alone.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
To try, tempt, test. From peira; to test, i.e. Endeavor, scrutinize, entice, discipline.
Gen: in behalf of; acc: above.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: Who, which, what, that.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 2nd Person Plural
str2: (a) I am powerful, have (the) power, (b) I am able, I can. Of uncertain affinity; to be able or possible.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
With. A primary preposition denoting union; with or together.
From peirazo; a putting to proof (of good), experience (of evil), solicitation, discipline or provocation); by implication, adversity.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.
(a) a way out, escape, (b) result, issue. From a compound of ek and the base of basis; an exit.

parse: Verb - Present Infinitive Middle or Passive
str2: (a) I am powerful, have (the) power, (b) I am able, I can. Of uncertain affinity; to be able or possible.
To bear up under, endure, suffer. From hupo and phero; to bear from underneath, i.e. to undergo hardship.
